successes.title: Prodigy the Game
successes.description: Prodigy is a tactical RPG with figurines, a new way to play that we will create with you. Thank you so much for your support!

Pledges.description: THANK YOU PACK

Select this option if you wish to support the project and receive a big thank you from the team - every dollar helps!
(this reward cannot include add-ons)
ART PACK - Artbook + OST
Choose your Faction and receive the corresponding digital artbook, as well as the digital soundtrack (this reward is purely digital and cannot include physical add-ons).
A LA CARTE PACK - Add-ons only

Select this option if you wish to get add-ons only. Initial pledge covers shipping costs to US. Simply increase your pledge according to the value of the items you wish to get - the end of project survey will allow you to select your rewards. Please add $10 for international shipping.
DELUXE ART PACK - Deluxe artbook + OST
Receive the digital deluxe artbook covering both Factions with exclusive content, as well as the digital soundtrack (this reward is purely digital and cannot include physical add-ons).
TROPHY PACK - Artbook + OST + Warbeast

Choose your Faction and receive an ART PACK, as well as the War Trophy Warbeast in its Kickstarter exclusive paint (this reward has exclusive shipping costs and cannot include physical add-ons). Please add $7 for US shipping, $10 for international shipping.
EARLY THORNS PACK - 1 starter set + the game

Early bird! Receive the Company of Thorns. Includes game pack, starter set of Company of Thorns figurines and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.
EARLY STORM PACK - 1 starter set + the game

Early bird! Receive the Company of the Storm. Includes game pack, starter set of Company of the Storm figurines and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.
KICKSTARTER PACK - 1 starter set + the game

Choose the Company of Thorns or the Company of the Storm. Includes game pack, starter figurine set of your choice and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.
DELUXE PACK - 1 starter set + the game +  deluxe items

Choose the Company of Thorns or the Company of the Storm. Includes game pack, starter figurine set of your choice, deluxe artbook, OST, T-shirt and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.
COMPANION TO MANY PACK - 2 starter sets + the game

Includes game pack, 2 different starter figurine sets (6 figurines) and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.
COMPANY PACK - 1 full Company + the game

Choose the Company of Thorns or the Company of the Storm. Includes game pack, full Company of your choice (6 figurines), digital artbook of your choice, digital OST and exclusive Kickstarter game content: colors for your ingame name, visual effects and Mana, a forum badge and HD wallpapers.
Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.
DUO STARTER PACK - 2 starter sets + 2 games
Receive two KICKSTARTER PACKS (one for each Company) for the shipping cost of one. Please add $20 for US shipping, $30 for international shipping.
BETA PACK - 1 full Company + beta game
